trans-unit.source: Sites bind a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> and enable communication between them, as well as provide a way for the container to manage its components.
trans-unit.target: 站点绑定<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>到<xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>和启用它们之间的通信，以及为要管理其组件的容器提供的方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: Sites can also serve as a repository for container-specific, per-component information, such as the component name.
trans-unit.target: 站点还可以充当容器详细信息，每个组件的信息，如组件名称的存储库。

trans-unit.source: For more information about components, see [Programming with Components](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关组件的详细信息，请参阅[使用组件编程](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the component associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> when implemented by a class.
trans-unit.target: 获取与关联的组件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref>时由类实现。

trans-unit.source: A valid value for this property (that is, the value is not `null`) indicates that the component has been added to a container.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的有效值 (值，即不是`null`) 指示该组件已添加到容器。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> when implemented by a class.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>与关联<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref>时由类实现。

trans-unit.source: `null` for the Container property indicates that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> instance does not have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>.
trans-unit.target: `null`容器属性指示<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>实例是否不具有<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the component is in design mode when implemented by a class.
trans-unit.target: 确定组件是否处于设计模式时由类实现。

trans-unit.source: The design mode indicator is stored in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>; therefore, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> does not have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> associated with it, this property is always `false`.
trans-unit.target: 设计模式指示器存储在<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>; 因此，如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>没有<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>与它关联，此属性是始终`false`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component is in design mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果组件是在设计模式下;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the component associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> when implemented by a class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与关联的组件的名称<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref>时由类实现。

trans-unit.source: The components within a container might or might not be named.
trans-unit.target: 容器内的组件可能会也可能没有名称。

trans-unit.source: If a component is given a name, the name must be unique among all the components within the container.
trans-unit.target: 如果组件未提供一个名称，名称必须是唯一的容器内的所有组件之间。

trans-unit.source: The name of the component associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref>; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if no name is assigned to the component.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的组件的名称<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref>; 或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，如果没有名称分配给该组件。
